about_the_game:
Have you ever wondered what is in the Communist Manifesto? Do you have a thing for hot anime MILFs? Do you have a thing for German Philosophers and wish they were hot anime MILFs? Your weirdly specific needs are finally being met in “The Cummunist Manifesto: Dommy Mommy Commie Adventure.” At it’s core “The Cummunist Manifesto” is a kinetic novel featuring the addition of a pair of banger tits.


What can you expect from the Cummunist Manifesto?
  • Sexy shoe-less feet
  • An education on class struggle
  • A hot and steamy beach scene
  • A new original song featuring digitally made vocals that may be recognizable to those who like such things; but legally we can't use her name.
  • Critiques on different forms of Socialism and Communism as well as Capitalism and its constant repression of the proletariat.
  • Tits
  • One hand-drawn hot-as-heck MILF (No AI was used in making this project)
  • Learn about the coming inevitable communist revolution


The Cummunist Manifesto: Dommy Mommy Commie Adventure is a casual sexy fun innovative game meant for the whole family of people who are 18 or older. It's intelligent, provocative, and sexy! So what are you waiting for? Play it today but remember: “The history of all hitherto existing society is the history of class struggles and looking for hella nice anime milf titties.”

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains references to sex as well as revealing outfits.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 236 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2.0 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 153 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher.
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2.0 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 163 MB available space

short_description: The Cummunist Manifesto is a kinetic novel retelling of the classic Communist Work "The Communist Manifesto" by Karl Marx except Karl is now a busty babe.
